ygData.subject: Re: Test of Truth:  No Venom Sacks!
ygData.msgSnippet: I go through a *lot* of Giant Spiders in the West Karanas, and the venom sac is fairly uncommon for loot - if the Desert Tarantulas are the East Coast
ygData.messageBody:
I go through a *lot* of Giant Spiders in the West Karanas, and the venom sac
is fairly uncommon for loot - if the Desert Tarantulas are the East Coast
equivalent then you'll just have to keep killing those 8-legged horrors. I
generally find the sac every 40th spider or so...

Good hunting to you, Paladin.

Kaladin of Qeynos

David wrote:

> From: David <dnolle@...>
>
> Hello,
> I've killed over 10 Desert Tarantulas but haven't found the Venom Sacks I
> need to get my "Token of Courage" for the Test of Truth Quest. Am I doing
> something wrong?
>
> Pendor Paldan of the 6th Level
